statements: SELECT * FROM user_preferences
SELECT chatting_speed, language_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, chatting_speed, timezone FROM user_preferences
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE language_preference = 'English' AND timezone = 'GMT'
SELECT user_id, timezone, chatting_speed, language_preference FROM user_preferences
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 12345
SELECT user_id, language_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE chatting_speed = 'fast' AND timezone = 'UTC+2'
SELECT DISTINCT timezone FROM user_preferences ORDER BY timezone DESC
SELECT user_id, timezone FROM user_preferences WHERE language_preference IN ('English', 'French')
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE timezone LIKE '%+%'
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT theme, language FROM UserPreferences WHERE theme = 'Dark';
SELECT response_text, emotion FROM ChatbotResponses WHERE emotion = 'Happy' ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ChatbotResponses;
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM UserPreferences WHERE theme = 'Light' AND language = 'English';
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT theme, language FROM UserPreferences WHERE theme = 'Dark';
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE language = 'English' AND theme = 'Light';
SELECT response_text FROM ChatbotResponses WHERE emotion = 'Happy';
SELECT response_text, emotion FROM ChatbotResponses WHERE emotion IN ('Sad', 'Excited');
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT chatbot_theme, language_preference FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_responses ORDER BY date_sent DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommendation FROM chatbot_recommendations WHERE recommendation_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, language_preference, timezone FROM user_preferences WHERE timezone LIKE '%GMT%';
SELECT user_id, chatbot_theme, language_preference, timezone FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, chatbot_theme, language_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE language_preference = 'English' AND timezone = 'GMT';
SELECT user_id, recommendation, date_created FROM chatbot_recommendations WHERE date_created > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT user_id, response, date_sent FROM chatbot_responses WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY date_sent ASC;
SELECT user_id, recommendation, date_created FROM chatbot_recommendations WHERE recommendation LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT user_id, theme FROM UserPreferences WHERE theme = 'Dark';
SELECT user_id, notification_settings FROM UserPreferences WHERE notification_settings = true;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_date FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM ChatbotRecommendations WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM UserPreferences WHERE theme = 'dark';
SELECT notification_settings, theme FROM UserPreferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM ChatbotRecommendations WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, preference_name FROM preferences ORDER BY preference_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM chatbot_messages WHERE message_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, response_time FROM user_responses WHERE response_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users JOIN preferences ON users.user_id = preferences.user_id WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY user_id ASC;

SELECT user_id, message_text, response_text FROM chatbot_messages JOIN user_responses ON chatbot_messages.message_id = user_responses.message_id WHERE response_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY response_time DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT preferences.preference_name, users.username, chatbot_messages.response_text FROM preferences JOIN users ON preferences.user_id = users.user_id JOIN chatbot_messages ON preferences.preference_id = chatbot_messages.message_id WHERE preferences.category = 'Technology' ORDER BY users.username ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT users.user_id, users.username, user_responses.response_time FROM users LEFT JOIN user_responses ON users.user_id = user_responses.user_id WHERE user_responses.response_time IS NOT NULL ORDER BY users.user_id DESC LIMIT 3;
